name: Salesforce, Inc.
summary: Salesforce, Inc. is a leading American cloud-based software company specializing in customer relationship management (CRM) solutions, with a broad suite of applications for sales, customer service, marketing automation, analytics, and artificial intelligence. Headquartered in San Francisco, Salesforce is recognized as one of the worldâ€™s largest enterprise software providers and is publicly traded on the NYSE under the ticker CRM.
